properties.question: What is the most appropriate initial management for a patient with external hemorrhoidal thrombosis?
properties.option_a: Immediate surgical excision of the thrombosed hemorrhoid
properties.option_b: Application of a warm compress to the affected area
properties.option_d: Waiting for the thrombosed hemorrhoid to spontaneously resolve
